thread.title: U.S. Dollar Falls as ECB Sends Hawkish Signal

author: Daniel Kruger
title: U.S. Dollar Falls as ECB Sends Hawkish Signal
text:
The U.S. dollar fell Thursday after minutes from the European Central Bankâ€™s December meeting signaled the central bank may phase out its bond-buying program sooner than investors had expected.
The Wall Street Journal Dollar Index, which measures the currency against a basket of 16 others, fell 0.4% to 85.46, as the euro strengthened 0.7%.
